law.text: The title to all property acquired for the purposes of this chapter, shall be in the name of the board, and the board may exchange or sell for the benefit and use of the home, any of the property conveyed to, or owned or held by the board. All such sales or exchanges of real estate must be authorized or approved by the county judge/executive and by the mayor of the city of the first class.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 938b-14.
